bibl.title: Appointment for John J. Moran, September 15, 1904

div1.p: Moran is appointed clerk in the Canal Zone Health Department.

div1.head: Appointment for John J. Moran, September 15, 1904
div1.opener:
ISTHMIAN CANAL COMMISSION
Sept 16 1904
CHIEF SANITARY OFFICE
ISTHMIAN CANAL ZONE,
EXECUTIVE OFFICE.
Ancon, C.Z., Sept. 15, 1904.
Sir:
div1.p:
Subject to approval by the Isthmian Canal Commission,
you are hereby appointed clerk in the Health Department
of the Canal Zone at a salary of $125 gold per month to
take effect from and to include the 9th instant.
div1.closer:
Very respectfully, M. W. Davis
Governor. Mr. John J. Moran,
Cristobal, Canal Zone.
(Thro' the Acting Chief Sanitary Officer.)
1.
4

div1.p:
The Governor of the Canal Zone
Notifies Mr. John J. Moran
that he is appointed Clerk in
the Health Department at a sal-
ary of $125. gold per month,
subject to the approval of the
Commission, to commence on the
9th inst.

div1.head: Letter from Theo C. Lyster
div1.opener:
✓
1st Indorsement.
Office of the
Chief Sanitary Officer
Ancon, C. Z., Sept.17'04
div1.p:
Respectfully transmitted,
(Through the Health Officer, Colon)
to Mr. John J. Moran.
div1.closer:
By Order of the Acting
Chief Sanitary Officer: Theo C. Lyster
Executive Officer,
Sanitary Department. ********************************

div1.head: Letter from L.N. Smarting
div1.opener:
2d Endorsement.
Office of the Health Officer
Cristobal, C. Z.,
September 19, '04.
div1.p:
Respectfully transmitted to
Mr. John J. Moran.
